emails.subject: RE: Weather Plot Average Issue
emails.body_text:
Thank you so much, guys.

 

Regards,

Marcelo Maciel

 

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 
Sent: Thursday, March 6, 2025 4:51 AM
To: Nogueira Maciel, Marcelo <Marcelo.Maciel@jbssa.com>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Subject: [Ext]- RE: Weather Plot Average Issue

 

CAUTION:*This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe.* 

 

________________________________

Hello,

 

It is done , crop year is now excluded from the average calculation

 



 

If you have any questions or if you need any further assistance please do not hesitate to reach out.

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 



 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io <mailto:info@dnext.io>  | www.dnext.io <http://www.dnext.io/> 

 

 

From: Nogueira Maciel, Marcelo <Marcelo.Maciel@jbssa.com <mailto:Marcelo.Maciel@jbssa.com> > 
Sent: Wednesday, March 5, 2025 16:42
To: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >
Subject: RE: Weather Plot Average Issue

 

Hello Guys,

 

Is it possible to exclude this year data from the avg calculation?

 

Regards,

Marcelo Maciel

 

From: Cox, David <David.Cox@jbssa.com <mailto:David.Cox@jbssa.com> > 
Sent: Wednesday, March 5, 2025 7:40 AM
To: Nogueira Maciel, Marcelo <Marcelo.Maciel@jbssa.com <mailto:Marcelo.Maciel@jbssa.com> >
Subject: Weather Plot Average Issue

 

 

It looks to me like the black average line is including this year’s actual. That doesn’t make sense.

 



 

David Cox

Commodity Derivatives Trader | Risk Management

David.Cox@jbssa.com <mailto:David.Cox@jbssa.com>  | jbsfoodsgroup.com <http://jbsfoodsgroup.com> 

O: 970.506.7573

1770 Promontory Circle | Greeley, CO 80634
